text: Hanki anantera mago kumate naga'mo'za, oti'za mago kumate nagara zamahegahaze. Mago kaziga vahe'mo'za oti'za, mago kaziga vahera ha' rezmantegahaze. Ana nehanageno mago'a kumapina imi e'nerisigeno, mago'a kumapina agate'za fore hugahie. Ama ana zamo'a, a'mo'ma mofavre kasentenaku higeno, agafa huno ata negriankna ataza fore hugahie.
